implementation_output.changes_summary: Renamed bootstrap_service.py to windows_service.py via git mv (preserving history). Updated all 8 references: 2 internal self-references in windows_service.py (error message + usage comment), 3 in installer.py (2 lazy imports + 1 docstring), 2 in windows/__init__.py (docstring + import statement), 1 in dispatcher.py (usage comment), 2 in docs/PRD.md (table entry + directory tree). Zero remaining bootstrap_service references in source or docs.

results.note: from .windows_service import (...) - import resolves at runtime on Windows (lazy imports in platform guards)
Lazy imports inside sys.platform == 'win32' guards - correct pattern
